description: Pierce Paris has two surprises for the chiseled stud Danny Montero. The first surprise is a new Doc Johnson dildo molded after Danny's favorite porn star, tattooed beefcake William Seed. Danny can't believe how real it feels when muscular hunk Pierce slides the toy into his ass, and Pierce loves watching the brown-haired cutie squirm. Of course, the only way that Pierce can top his first surprise is by sneakily swapping out the certified copy for the real deal, letting William Seed give his man the pounding he can only get from the real thing.
title: Just Like the Real Thing
